00071 void joCross::_validate(bool for_real)
00072 {
00073         copy_info();
00074         input1().validate( for_real );
00075         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00076         Format temp = info_.format();
00077         width = temp.width();
00078         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );
00079 }

00081 void joCross::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00082 {
00083         input0().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00084         input1().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00085 }
00086 
00087 void joCross::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00088 {
00090         out.range( 0, width );
00092         Row in1(x, r);
00093         Row in2(x, r);
00094 
00095         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00096         input1().get(y, x, r, channels, in2);
00098         foreach (z, channels) 
00099         {
00101                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00102                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00103                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00105                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00106                 {
00107 
00109                         Vector one( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index],in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00110                         Vector two( in2[Chan_Red][index], in2[Chan_Green][index], in2[Chan_Blue][index]);
00112                         if ( one.length() > 0.0001 && two.length() > 0.0001 )
00113                         {
00115                                 Vector result = one.cross( two );
00117                                 if( result.length() > 0.0001 && normalize )
00118                                         result.normalize();
00120                                 outPixelsR[index] = result.x;
00121                                 outPixelsG[index] = result.y;
00122                                 outPixelsB[index] = result.z;
00123 
00124                         } 
00125                         else
00126                         {
00127                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00128                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00129                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00130                         }
00131 
00132 
00133                         
00134                 }
00135                 
00136         }
00137 }
